viewData.name: LG UK6570PUB 86" Class HDR UHD Smart IPS LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy LG UK6570PUB 86" Class HDR UHD Smart IPS LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 IPS LED Panel, HDR10 & HLG Support 120 Hz Refresh Rate, TruMotion 240. Review LG UK6570
viewData.long_description: Enjoy UHD HDR video with compatible content and the LG UK6570PUB 86" Class HDR UHD Smart IPS LED TV. The 85.6" LED-backlit LCD panel features a native resolution of 3840 x 2160, allowing you to view UHD images, and the 120 Hz refresh rate with TruMotion 240 technology helps reduce the blur commonly associated with fast-moving, on-screen objects. It can display HLG and HDR10 video with compatible source devices and content. Its four HDMI inputs allow you to connect your digital HD sources, such as HD cable/satellite boxes or game consoles.
